website_summaries.verdict: Top of the line, slick operating toaster that will make you feel like toast is a luxury item.
pros: Allows you to monitor your bread and continue to brown until it reaches your desired level of toast
Delivers your best toast every time
cons: This toaster is a lot more expensive than many others on the market

website_summaries.verdict: An elegant toaster that gives you the freedom to toast up to 4 slices of bread at once using 2 different settings.
pros: 4-slice toaster enables you to set toast to 2 different settings at once
Browning control slider with LED progress tracker
A Bit More, bagel, defrost and Lift and Look settings
cons: Users have reported some electrical issues that force them to restart the toaster

customer_reviews.title: it is a great toaster and I would like a replacement given I ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this toaster and it broke after 2 days - 2 of the 4 slots don't work. I have been unable to reach Breville despite calls and email. And Amazon will not return the item (and the return policy was not clearly stated at all). For $180 completely unsatisfactory. I am hoping this review prompts a response. Aside from that, it is a great toaster and I would like a replacement given I have had it less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: gwr

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Bad Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, lousy toaster. Has a setting of 1 to 6 for doneness. On three it just dries the surface a little (See photos, right side). Toasts on 6, but very unevenly from side to side (See photos, left side). Disappointed in Breville.
customer_reviews.author: Agillator

customer_reviews.title: Heater or Toaster?
customer_reviews.text: mechanically this is a very nice toaster. Automatically raising and lowering toast is pretty cool. However, this is the second different Breville toaster I have had. The first was the Breville toaster oven. Also a very nice device. My issue is that I like a my toast toasted - brown in color I find that both toaster had to be put on the highest setting and often had to re toast to get my english muffins, bagels and regular toast - toasted. I'm keeping this model but still not happy with the way it takes a long time to toast.
customer_reviews.author: BC59

customer_reviews.title: Half the elements are not working.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the toaster to replace my outgoing one, unboxed it, plugged it in, and tested it out. HALF THE ELEMENTS ARE NOT WORKING? I go to Amazon to initiate a return and it states it's "ineligible for return." Now I'm stuck with a $180 toaster that only half works! WTF!
customer_reviews.author: Twelvizm

customer_reviews.title: Half the coils do not work
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks great and love the high-tech lowering of the food item, however, half the coils never worked from the start. Nothing like your waffles being toasted on one side and soggy cold on the other. Disappointed in Breville. Would have expected much more.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 years.  Made good toast.
customer_reviews.text: Mine just worked, and it lasted 9.5 years (since June 6, 2010). Thing ran like a champ. We just cleaned out the crumb tray once in a while, but not often enough. One side toasts fine still. The other side is only a bagel toaster. I diagnosed the problem. One of the tiny "threads" on the far left side -- those elements that get hot and turn red -- is severed. The technical word for the part is "nichrome" ribbon, and it is used as a resistance wire that gets hot. That is coupled to the outside heating for the other toast of this "pair". I'm going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: SI

customer_reviews.title: We finally had a reason to upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: My last Breville smart toaster lasted 11 years. It recently started toasting only one side of the bread. This was actually a good thing because we wanted a 4 slice toaster. I looked into getting other toasters but my husband really liked all the buttons and the look and lift. He didn’t want to settle on a basic toaster, he wanted me to get the bigger one. It’s a bit on the pricy side for a toaster but it, to me and my husband, is worth it. The look, the quality, the tech aspect of it being all automatic appealed to us enough to upgrade. Hopefully, this one will last us longer that 11 years.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lemon Evers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lifespan
customer_reviews.text: This toaster worked great for about two months. The heating elements in the center no longer work and it periodically decides it will not raise the toast after its finished. None of the buttons will function. The toaster will reset after remaining unplugged for a while so that I can start the process over again. Breville customer service is apparently aware of this issue but that doesn't help the people that shelled out for a premium toaster. Take your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: YaDirt

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I hated to spend so much on a toaster, I have to say it was worth it. It feels and looks very well made. I guess only time will tell how long it lasts. It took about 3 tries to get the settings dialed in just how we like it. My husband likes his bread toasted darker than I do, and it does all to perfection. We've also toasted bagels and they turned out perfect as well. All the buttons and settings are easy to use and understand. It really is a great product and I hope it lasts for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Toaster
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toaster for ourselves. This toaster has several options depending on what your toasting but my favorite feature is being able to lift the item I am toasting while it is toasting to see if it is toasted enough or not. The english muffin/toast/bagel will lift up for you to view while the toaster stays on. This is a great option as my husband and I like different toasting levels. This product is high quality and very durable. We love it so much, we purchased one for our son and another for our daughter. Now when we visit their homes, we have a quality toaster to use.
customer_reviews.author: T. St. Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy unless you have a DEDICATED ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have a dedicated circuit for this toaster it will not work correctly. It's off/on toast won't come up etc. Now this is a TOASTER not a microwave, not an Oven, not a Stove, not a Dryer, Not a Washer, not a Dishwasher this is a simple toaster . Who would have a house designed that would have a plug-in only for toaster that is a dedicated direct electrical circuit. If you don't then this toaster will give you problems!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thais Davis

customer_reviews.title: The Best Toaster Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: The best toaster we have ever owned. It is expensive but when something is this well designed and constructed one should expect it will cost more. The features are easy to use and figure out. i like the 1800 watt total output of the heaters. One problem with some 4 slicers is the low rating for making two slices. It takes longer. This 4-Slice toaster fast enough. It is entertaining to use. Not sure how to set the intensity for a new bread? Just press "Lift and Look" part way through. Not toasted enough? Press "A Bit More". There is nothing negative about this quality device.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson John

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has spent a lot of time and wasted money on other toasters that never seem to get it quite right for all the things we toast: bread, bagels, English muffins, frozen waffles, etc. The Breville handles them all with ease and the kind of consistency you'd expect from this brand. Totally worth the money if you like toasted breads at all, ever, period.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Holter

customer_reviews.title: Updated review - better than most!
customer_reviews.text: I have high expectations for toasters, especially those that are on the upper end, price wise. This is the best toaster I have used and, admittedly, I have purchased a couple recently in my search for the optimal toaster. Overall this ones features are the best but I still find the elements do not toast as evenly as I expect for the money. However, it is better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy King

customer_reviews.title: Toaster with a brain
customer_reviews.text: This is a pricey toaster, but you only live once and while you are, you should treat yourself with this beauty! Who'd have thought I wouldn't miss the sliding down of a slice of toast? I don't. I actually like not having those ugly knobs! The toaster works flawlessly, is quiet, is well thought out and it's easy to keep clean. Oh...and it toasts perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Taylor Leavens

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: This toaster stopped working after two months. Most of the time, it does not toast at all. Sometimes, it will toast on one side; sometimes it will no toast at all.. The setting controls are, for all practical purposes, useless. I had expected better. The manufacturer has agreed to replace the unit. I hope the new one works because in theory I love this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: L.Grossberg

customer_reviews.title: Premium product that did not last
customer_reviews.text: Great design and features, good looking, but left hand 2 slice transport stopped lowering the bread, but the toaster elements heat up and toast 1.2 of the bread (bottom half). At this price point, the product should last for more than one year, I found no way to manually lower the bread so it is now a 2-slice toaster for the price of a premium 4 slice toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Goldenberg

customer_reviews.title: No I don't recommend this company
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 slice "long" version September 2014 - it stopped working properly Dec '15. 3 months out of warranty. No I don't recommend this company. To be fair - they claim they will replace the 3 month out of warranty machine, but still, a $200 toaster that stops working after 15 months is not something I would recommend to anybody. I bough this version in Feb 2015 - so just waiting for it to fail. I expect failure May 2015 is all goes according to past experience.
customer_reviews.author: IAmTheWolf

customer_reviews.title: It does it all, I love it
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is great, love the 30sec more button. Looks fabulous, easy to clean and will last a lifetime (I hope). But not cheap. Is it worth it? I can't say it that it functions so much better than any of the much cheaper competitors but I got it for it's durability and looks and the little extra features.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: We bought our Breville BTA840xl toaster because of the reviews and product testimonials. We have our toaster now for 3 months and all was well till now. On of the middle elements sees not to toast, the wires that normally light up are not and the toast is cooking uneven. I am disappointed in this, I thought we bought a quality product, and for it to go out in 3 months is troubling. We need to exchange this for another one in hopes its just a one time incident.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Gould

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The skits could be slightly wider! A simple bran muffin, not excessively large in size, cut in half, STILL gets caught in the holder when the toasting job comes to an end, the machine has to be unplugged, so that a knife can be inserted to ease the muffin out of the machine,
customer_reviews.author: David Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster was expensive but definitely worth the money. The bagel setting is great as is the little bit more button. The buttons are very easy to operate as their location is on top of the toaster not on the bottom. The brushed chrome finish doesn’t show fingerprints. If one can be enthusiastic over a toaster, I most definitely am as is my picky husband.
customer_reviews.author: Paprika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toaster...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven gets used every single day! So so far so good. The bagel setting it's super accurate, the ( lift and look ) button is awesome and of course the beep it make when the bread pops up.. great when your busy around the kitchen.. so far the Breville brand has done right by me...
customer_reviews.author: Louie V.

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy with Product
customer_reviews.text: It more than meets all our needs. In fact, it seems so high-tech I expected bluetooth or wifi! (We've brainstormed what those would be used for!) All kidding aside, it's a great toaster that is EXACTLY as described.
customer_reviews.author: Brutally Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful product - broke within 35 days
customer_reviews.text: After paying $179 for this toaster the lifting mechanism broke completely after a few weeks of light use. Contacted the seller who (conveniently for them) refused to return and refund the item as it was 5 days outside the 30 day return window. Now I'm stuck with Breville's warranty department who at best will offer me a replacement for a toaster I wouldn't again buy in a million years. Avoid the toaster, it ain't so smart.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bilsland

customer_reviews.title: Love the flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Love this still after 2 years. 4 slots, each pair with a crumb tray. Handles a variety of breads, thicknesses, such as bagels (with buttons to designate bagels ), also buttons for additional time if the first go didn't work. No problems in 2 years. I wouldn't recommend it but have used it to warm up left over pizza, just to warm... not cook.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a two slice toaster for my parents 4 years ago and they love it. Through the years I have used it from time to time and chose to purchase a four place toaster for my family. Very well made and excellent quality. I’m guessing that this will be the last toaster we ever purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Twinmaker

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: The price is worth it to me. I've been looking for, and testing toasters for years. The BTA840XL meets all my requirements so far: 1. Consistent browning of light, dry American white bread, bagels, heavy German eye bread, English muffins. 2. Ease of use. 3. Reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Robinson

customer_reviews.title: A Breville toaster after four years.
customer_reviews.text: We loved our Breville. We were spoiled by the special features. We've had it for 4 years, and just yesterday I noticed it only toasted one side of all the four slices that I'd put in. So, now I am looking for a repair place for the toaster. There do not seem to be places that repair them. Do I just junk it and buy another? An update Feb. 2019 thus far we've used two Breville toasters: One in 2011 another in 2014! Both have had the same problem . one side doesn't work. We shall not buy another Breville. Does Breville ever read customer reviews? Obviously, they do not for the same problem persists.
customer_reviews.author: Jal Mistri

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since toasted bread!
customer_reviews.text: This does it all. Super simple to operate, which my 85 year old in-laws need. Press a button. bread goes down. Beeps, bread comes up, all done. Useful for larger breads and waffles, too! Traded in my $300 toaster for this and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Gecko-Loc

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this toaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a very expensive Viking toaster that always burned the toast. I LOVE this toaster it never burns. I also like to toast tortillas (very thin). In my old toaster they always fell to the sides and I had to dig them out. The Breville toaster has side protectors that secure in place whatever your toasting so things don't fall to the sides/bottom of the toaster. I also own a Breville food processor and blender and absolutely love them all!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg W

customer_reviews.title: Haven't tried all the settings yet but as long as the toast comes out to where I can spread the butter & whatever else I want to put on the toast that's fine with me
customer_reviews.text: Finally a toaster that doesn't dry out the bread! Haven't tried all the settings yet but as long as the toast comes out to where I can spread the butter & whatever else I want to put on the toast that's fine with me. Replaced my Krups toaster with this one. What a difference. No more dry toast!
customer_reviews.author: sas

customer_reviews.title: Breville 4-Slice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best kitchen appliances I have ever purchased. It is so nice to never have to adjust the darkness controls when making toast. My wife has one side and I have the other. The only drawback is ours and not the toaster....sometimes in cleaning the counter, we accidentally move one of the level controls. Other than that, you will be extremely pleased with this toaster. If a different type of bread is used, the "lift and look" button is really advantageous as is the "just a bit longer" one. There is a separate button for bagels. Excellent toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Bob19

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received two of these toasters. Both did not work. Had to return both and order another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Have had the Breville toaster 2 months. Daily use ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had the Breville toaster 2 months. Daily use and it performed well. All features working - UNTIL - this week. Unable to cancel the toast cycle, all the LED lights continuous flashing - the only way to stop toasting cycle is to unplug device, then use fork or pliers to remove the toast. Unplugging seems to reset - temporarily. The problem is not one side or the other . The return window ended 31 Jan - $127 down the drain. Attempting to contact Breville direct for resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Y.

customer_reviews.title: Reseat the clean out trays before using it the first time.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this toaster was defective in that bagels and toast would not pop up when finished toasting. After calling customer service (who were very prompt in getting back to me), they suggested that I remove the bottom trays and turn the unit upside down to shake any crumbs out and try it again before I send it back. I did that and now the unit works perfectly. There were no crumbs in the toaster because it was brand new but I think the clean out trays had to be reseated for it to work correctly. I would recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Braun

customer_reviews.title: Best Toaster Period
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few toasters in my life, all of them have been cheaper and temperamental. This toaster is amazingly consistent and the bagel setting works well. No regrets spending the extra money on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Helene L

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking toaster great features, but.....
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this toaster you'd think it could toast BOTH sides of the bread equally? No sir. I must say, however, hat I bought 3 other toasters before this one and they all had the same issue. Looks like all the manufacturers use the same Chinese elements. Too bad, this is otherwise a beautiful machine.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Acura

customer_reviews.title: Last toaster you'll ever own!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster lives up to the hype. The layout of the controls is well thought out. All in all a fabulous replacement for our tired two-slice model.
customer_reviews.author: Larinoc

customer_reviews.title: Almost Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and all the super-helpful features. Toasts unevenly, unfortunately. I really want to love it, but I just can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hughes

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good.
customer_reviews.text: Handsome, push button toaster that works quietly and toasts perfectly ... so far. The knock on this product is that the electronics fail and customer support is poor. If it continues to function for say 5 years then it is worth the quadruple price that was charged. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Programming got stuck once but I unplugged it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Programming got stuck once but I unplugged it then plugged it back in and has been fine since then.
customer_reviews.author: michael j. trahan

customer_reviews.title: Worlds greatest toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Well, not sure about that, but Breville makes great products and this is yet another example. It looks sharp, is easy to use, centers the bread in the heat chamber, and makes perfect toast each and every time. In a world filled with cheap junk that doesn't work well or last very long, this item is well worth the money, is designed, and built well, and will likely last longer than I will. Hmmm... Better start toasting.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Junk
customer_reviews.text: Every 3 or 4 times, the bread will fail to automatically rise. The unit must then be unplugged and the bread extracted by hand. All four ports toast very unevenly - barely browned on one side and nearly incinerated on the other. Best two-word description of this product is “overpriced junk”.
customer_reviews.author: typhoon10

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product. Toasts perfectly for each setting. Great number of settings. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this toaster! Looks great! Toasts even better! Love the options and dials are true to expectations of how toasty you want it done! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster, lots of cool features but still not perfect at toasting. I have to have the toaster set at the highest levels just to get an English muffin lightly browned. Keeping the toaster but I think it could do a better job toasting!
customer_reviews.author: D. Broms

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results
customer_reviews.text: Like most I am seeing uneven browning at times, but mostly it works right. It looks fantastic and when it does it's job properly, I love it. Like one reviewer stated it does great on English Muffins. I love Nutri-Grain whole wheat Eggo waffles and this toaster browns them perfectly without drying them out... When it is working right. If I thought it would make a difference I would exchange it, but with all the mixed reviews, I will just save myself the time and keep a close eye on this one.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great and cool features for perfect toast
customer_reviews.text: Like the “a little bit more” feature and the “take a peek” feature. I’m really enjoying this toaster, not to mention the actual toast :)
customer_reviews.author: Artist

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought another Breville toaster for our second home. We would not have any other toaster. Period.
customer_reviews.author: UK

customer_reviews.title: Good product that works.
customer_reviews.text: Like the fellow who jumped from the top floor of a 50 story building. All the way down people heard him say, "So far, so good" We have only had this toaster for a short time but it works really good. Amazingly, it makes good toast. What else could you ask for in a toaster?
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ridgway

customer_reviews.title: Pricey toaster does adequate job
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second toaster as the first didn't work correctly. It did not heat both sides of the toast evenly. The replacement is no better, so I guess I'll just live with it the way it is. It does do a great job on bagels where it will toast the inside of the bagel and just warm the outside. It seems well built and has some nice features like a preview of doneness. This is the four slice model and there is also a two slice model that will take up less counter space.
customer_reviews.author: R. Leeds

customer_reviews.title: The best toaster
customer_reviews.text: It's beautifully made, works extremely well (toasts so well and so evenly), and has these extra functions that you never knew you needed ("a bit more"). I absolutely love it, and will buy another when the time comes. This is what great design means!
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster was pricey but the toast slices are even in color, which we had a hard time finding a toaster that did that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toasts correctly each time
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but if you want toast consistently even and some cool featres - this is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kons

customer_reviews.title: It's a royal POS that just happens to look nice. I would never buy this toaster again as ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're gonna spend this much for a toaster, you kind want it to not spazz out every 3rd time you make toast, have to unplug it and fish out the toast at the bottom. It's a royal POS that just happens to look nice. I would never buy this toaster again as it always shorts out.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke0612

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in april 2019. It’s August. and I am experiencing the same light flashing, carriage stuck problem others have experienced. Now I have to deal with the manufacturer. This is way too expensive to break in less than 4 Months. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: AquaG

customer_reviews.title: Cast quality toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster, at least after two months, is worth every penny. This is no tinny toaster and the quality of what it does is evident in every slice.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD LOPES

customer_reviews.title: A great toaster. Only reason it's not a 5 is ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. A great toaster. Only reason it's not a 5 is the high price
customer_reviews.author: Nautilass

customer_reviews.title: Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy to use but not that easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Don't use it a lot but it's worked great when I do use it
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for about a year now. Don't use it a lot but it's worked great when I do use it. I like that it has the wider slots as it works well for garlic bread. Looks very high end (as it should given the price).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fancy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this toaster for about 2 weeks now. It toasts evenly and well. I love the button setup and the features for use are good as well. If this toaster holds up, it will certainly have been worth the high price. One year later and its toasting unevenly. I sent this first one back for the same thing during the warranty period and they sent me the one I am using now.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in New York

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS HERE!  BEAUTIFUL~
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME toaster!! Really great features like the frozen and bagel settings...looks FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Therese Albright

customer_reviews.title: The Best Toaster with a Justifiable Price
customer_reviews.text: This is simply stated the best toaster on the market. We were introduced to it via my brother-in-law who received one as a gift. The price is justified in that the toasting properties excel. This will definitely be the last toaster that we will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: California Tennis Player

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: $200.00 bucks is really too much to spend on a toaster.... but it is worth every penny! The sleek design looks awesome on your kitchen counter. Toast is browned evenly on both sides. The few downsides.... but don't stop me from giving this toaster a 5-star. It's heavy....but durable and takes awhile to learn how much time to toast something, but once you get that down....it's a wonderful toaster. I will look at spending $200+ on my next (Breville) kitchen appliance...... I am sure it will be worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Item was opened, returned and resold.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a new product but this product was clearly returned and resold. The previous shipping label was still on the box.
customer_reviews.author: William Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is magical! I've never eaten a better toasted bagel in my life. Unbeleivable the way the bagel is crisp on the outside and chewy on the inside. I thought people were getting carried away when the talked about this toaster, no way! After owning one I'd never go back. It's expensive but worth every penny....
customer_reviews.author: Dmac

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best toaster on earth. I was so sick of every other toaster I've owned that have two settings: Warm and incinerate.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Brayton

customer_reviews.title: Pop Goes the Toast
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this toaster at my son's house and loved it so I bought one. The delivery time was good and the product is great. The settings are highlighted by a light system that indicates how much time is left on the toasting. The "A Little More" feature is great because it browns just a little bit more and reduces the probablility of "OOPS! I burned my bread". The bagel feature is nice too. The slow return of the bread makes the whole operation smooth and accurate. Glad I purchased one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it a 5 if the slots were long ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a 5 if the slots were long enough to fit wider bread (like rey bread) AND if they would make the "toast up" chime loud enough to hear. Yes, I know its adjustable and even at the highest setting its very difficult to hear.
customer_reviews.author: andruscp

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but works great
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I got good (not great value) for the price. It works fine and I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo45

customer_reviews.title: Has great features such as add a little time

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Toaster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product

customer_reviews.title: Even toasting

customer_reviews.author: Scott Wood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was so delighted when I first unboxed it. Looks great on the counter top and love the "A bit more" feature. Unfortunatly after only using it for 3 months, i notice, two of the slots does not brown the toast as expected in when placed at level 5, as this is not a cheap toaster, I am disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pancy G

customer_reviews.title: So far so Good
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item as a Christmas gift. We use our toaster everyday so it was important to get a good one. We've burn out many toasters from cheap to expensive. The Breville is awesome. Cooks toast evenly and within a reasonable timeframe. Most comments suggest that it will last forever. Fingers Crossed.
customer_reviews.author: TM195

customer_reviews.title: Blew Circut Breaker When Hit Start
customer_reviews.text: Toaster has two sides. Left side worked fine. Right side put in bread, hit start bang circuit breaker blew. Moved to another outlet same thing happened. Waiting on email and credit. Credit in full Received.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F Marsh

customer_reviews.title: The most expensive toaster I’ve ever owned lasted the shortest time.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that if I spent $150 for a toaster I wouldn’t have to buy another one again for a long time. My Breville toaster lasted two years and three months. It had a one year warranty. Don’t buy this toaster.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful AND useful !

customer_reviews.author: Mark Radulovich

customer_reviews.title: It's like a spaceship in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I realize its a lot to pay for a toaster. However, I'm kind of a nerd and get a kick out of the LED countdown lights, motorized lower/raising, the pleasant tone that goes off when your toast is done. It feels solid and well made
